words.definition: Any of various small gold coins minted in Italy and Turkey.

words.definition: A member of a society or class who herd animals from pasture to pasture with no fixed home.

words.definition: a person employed to remove dirt and refuse from streets

words.definition: A part broken off; a small, detached portion; an imperfect part, either physically or not

words.definition: The fastest gait of a horse, a two-beat stride during which all four legs are off the ground simultaneously.

words.definition: Of or relating to fable, myth or legend.

words.definition: A foreign person, particularly:

words.definition: Trashy, trivial, of little value.
